talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
Wake up, already! Don't let me see you around, go home!
(She is highly agitated.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard has been looking for you, {user_nick}.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
You know, the silver-haired woman who saved you from the Black Knight...
There is one silver-haired swordswoman that I know of…

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Well...it is unknown if she is a friend or foe.
It seems that she first appeared around the time the Black Knight did.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
I received some information from her about the Black Knight.
We suffered many casualties due to that...

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
A guild scout reported that a mysterious silver-haired woman was spotted around the Forest Sanctuary.
If you leave now, you might just be able to catch her before she leaves to find the Black Knight.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
If you do find her there, please tell her to continue hunting down the Black Knight in our place. The Guild has far too many casualties right now...

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
I think Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard has been looking for you, {user_nick}.

$Argenta$
Do not let me see you here, go home!
(She seems highly agitated.)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
A guild scout reported that a mysterious silver-haired woman was spotted around the Forest Sanctuary.
If you leave now, you might just be able to catch her before she leaves to find the Black Knight.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I heard that you're chasing after the Black Knight.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Why are you here?
(She seems highly agitated.)

$Argenta$
The Black Knight? Hahaha... The weak should not concern themselves with him.
Have you forgotten your defeat? I can defeat you just as easily... Just go back!

$Argenta$
Why are you interested in the Black Knight?
I'll give you some advice. FOgret all about him and go home, if you want to live.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You explain to her about the girl.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
A girl? You mean the little redhead the Black Knight carries around? I don't know anything about her.

$Argenta$
That...that girl is a descendant of the Ancients?
Argh. I'm way behind...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I made a promise to save her.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
(Her expression stiffens.)
A descendant of the Ancients...that changes things...
That doesn't explain why you're chasing the Black Knight though.

$Argenta$
A promise...? Hmph. What a joke...
I wonder if that empty promise is ever going to last when you face irresistable temptations...

$Argenta$
Anyway, I have little time to spare.
I will accept your help.
The Black Knight is probably on his way to the Sleepers' Temple.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where can I get the Pendant of the Pure?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I've figured out what his plans are. Now, help me find the Pendant of the Pure. We need to gain access to the Forgotten Temple.

$Argenta$
Ask that Adventurer's Guild guy or something! Just make your way to the Sleepers' Temple once you get the pendant.
We need to act quickly.
I'll see you around, kid.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey${action:Talk}
I heard that the adventurer who saved you is somewhere in the Forest Sanctuary, {user_nick}.
(Find Argenta at Forest Sanctuary.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard has been looking for you, {user_nick}.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Have you located the silver-haired swordswoman?

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Refusal}
The Black Knight is on his way to the Sleepers' Temple... It's obvious now that he is keen on obtaining the power of the Ancients.
But didn't you tell me that the swordswoman was interested in the girl too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>She didn't seem like a bad person.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Hmm... She might also be vying for the power of the Ancients. Perhaps, she may belong to an organization that we don't know about.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Don't trust people too easily.
Always remember that there are many kinds of people in this world.
You never know what might come back to haunt you.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Anyway, regarding the Pendant of the Pure... Perhaps Heraldry Scholar Bailey might know about it. Go and ask for his advice.

$Argenta$
Ask that Adventurer's Guild guy or something! Just make your way to the Sleepers' Temple once you get the pendant.
We need to act quickly.
I'll see you around, kid.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard${action:Talk}
Anyway, regarding the Pendant of the Pure... Perhaps Heraldry Scholar Bailey might know about it. Go and ask for his advice.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey${action:Talk}
Ah, you are {user_class} {user_nick}!
How did your pursuit of the Black Knight go?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You ask about the Pendant of the Pure.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
I'm glad you came back safely. How can I help you?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.contents:
Ask Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard about the silver-haired swordswoman who saved your life.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.

journal.title: Talk to the silver-haired swordswoman
journal.contents:
Head to the Forest Sanctuaryand ask the silver-haired woman about the whereabouts of the Black Knight and the girl.

Gray Ruins → Forest Sanctuary
journal.todo_msg: Find the silver-haired woman at Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.contents:
You have found out from Argenta that the Black Knight will be heading to the Sleepers' Temple next.
Return to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard and fill him in.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.todo_msg: Report back to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard

journal.title: Talk to Heraldry Scholar Bailey
journal.contents:
Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard said that Heraldry Scholar Bailey might have a clue about the Pendant of the Pure. Go to Heraldry Scholar Bailey to see if he can help.

Calderock Village → Heraldry Scholar Bailey
